title: Huge News for Tesla Stock Investors
text: Fool.com contributor Parkev Tatevosian gives his opinion on what Tesla's (NASDAQ: TSLA) numbers mean for investors and what's ahead for Tesla stock in 2024. *Stock prices used were the afternoon prices of Jan. 4, 2024. The video was published on Jan. 6, 2024. Where to invest $1,000 right now When our analyst team has a stock tip, it can pay to listen.
